description: This file is a server entry point for a Remix application, handling incoming requests, determining if the request is from a bot or a browser, and streaming server-side rendered React components accordingly.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main request handler that sets CORS headers, handles OPTIONS requests, and delegates to bot or browser-specific rendering functions.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for bot requests, streaming the response as HTML once ready.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for browser requests, streaming the response as HTML once ready.
